column1: '''Midway Games''' is an American video game publisher. They are the North American publishers of [[The Lord of the Rings Online: Shadows of Angmar]].
'''Inevitable Entertainment''', developers of the [[2003]] game ''[[The Hobbit (2003 video game)
column2: The Hobbit]]'', were acquired by Midway in [[2004]] and renamed Midway Austin. '''Surreal Software''', developers of the [[2002]] game ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring (video game)
column3: The Fellowship of the Ring]]'', was also acquired, but that company kept its original branding.
